sense.def:
To try to do something
pomeni truditi se, da bi nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: My sister tried to cheer me up.
I tried hard not to think about it.
Try and finish that by next Friday.
After a few tries they gave up.

sense.def:
To try for something
pomeni truditi se, da bi nekaj dobili ali dosegli.

cit.quote: poskusiti nekaj doseči, prizadevati si za

seg.quote: The school advised Mr Denby to let his son try for university.

sense.def:
To try something
pomeni nekaj uporabiti ali narediti, da bi tako ugotovili, kako uporabno, učinkovito ali prijetno je.

seg.quote: I tried a different approach to the problem.
We can give it a try and see how it looks.

sense.def:
To try a particular place or person
pomeni iti na neki kraj ali do neke osebe, ker mislimo, da bi tam lahko dobili tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: We tried two or three hotels, but they were full.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
is tried
, mora priti na sodišče; tam sodnik in porotniki poslušajo dokazni postopek in se nato odločijo, ali je tisti človek kriv ali nedolžen.

seg.quote: A youth was tried in the criminal courts for stealing.

sense.def:
To try on a piece of clothing
pomeni obleči oblačilo, da vidimo, ali je primerno za nas.

seg.quote: She tried on her new dress.

sense.def:
To try something out
pomeni preverjati, kako uporabno ali učinkovito je nekaj.

seg.quote: Oxford is trying out an idea to help working parents.
